spatial_accuracy.notes: General wall alignment and room placements are very strong. There is a slight compression in the Foyer/Entrance area and minor door swing orientation discrepancies in the Master Suite and Bed Room 3.

structural_fidelity.notes: All rooms from the 2D plan are present, including the Service Room and Utility. Wall thicknesses are consistent across the structure. Sliding doors for balconies are correctly interpreted.

furniture_mapping.notes: Excellent mapping of the living room seating and dining set. Minor scale issues with the furniture in Bed Room 4 and the orientation of the Master Bed rug relative to the plan.

aesthetic_quality.notes: The isometric projection is clean and technically sound. Lighting is soft and enhances depth without obscuring detail. Geometry is sharp with no visible mesh artifacts.

detected_errors.description: Master Bedroom door swing orientation is mirrored/incorrect compared to the 2D plan.
The kitchen island/counter layout deviates slightly from the L-shape indicated in the floor plan.
The balcony depth for the 6'0" wide balcony appears slightly shallower in proportion to the adjacent living room floor area.
